title: User Authentication with Email and Password
description: Verify that a user can successfully login using the email and password and gain access to the dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter a valid email address
Enter a valid password
Click the 'Entrar' (Login) button
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard
Verify session persists and remains valid

title: User Authentication with Invalid Email
description: Ensure the system handles login attempts with an invalid or unregistered email gracefully and does not send magic link.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter an invalid or unregistered email address and request a magic link
Verify no magic link is sent
Verify an appropriate error or info message is displayed to the user

title: Dashboard Real-Time Metrics Accuracy
description: Verify that the dashboard correctly displays real-time metrics for pageviews, clicks, joins, leaves, and retention analytics with ability to filter and export data.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the dashboard
Generate pageviews, clicks, join and leave events through test tracking funnels
Verify all event counts update accurately and in real-time on the dashboard
Apply date and other filters on metrics
Verify filters adjust displayed metrics accordingly
Export analytics data
Verify exported data matches displayed metrics

title: Facebook Pixel Creation with Valid Token
description: Validate successful creation of Facebook pixels with valid tokens and association with user profile.

steps.description: Navigate to Facebook pixel management interface
Enter valid pixel ID and a valid access token
Submit to create the pixel
Verify pixel is created successfully and appears in user's pixel list
Verify token validation occurs and invalid tokens are rejected

title: Facebook Pixel Update and Deletion
description: Ensure that updating pixel details (including tokens) and deleting pixels work correctly, including validation and user association.

steps.description: Select an existing pixel to update
Modify pixel details and update token
Submit update
Verify pixel details update successfully when valid
Verify token validation and error is shown for invalid tokens
Delete the pixel
Verify pixel is removed from user's pixel list

title: Telegram Bot/Channel Token Validation and Webhook Setup
description: Verify Telegram bot token validation with Telegram API, automatic chat ID detection, and webhook configuration succeed without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to Telegram bot/channel linking interface
Input a valid Telegram bot token
Submit to connect the bot
Verify successful token validation via Telegram API
Verify chat ID is automatically detected
Verify webhook setup completes without errors and status is shown

title: Telegram Bot/Channel Token Validation Failure Handling
description: Ensure that invalid Telegram bot tokens are detected, and meaningful error messages are presented to the user preventing bot linking.

steps.description: Navigate to Telegram bot/channel linking interface
Enter an invalid or expired bot token
Attempt to submit the bot token
Verify error message is displayed indicating invalid token
Verify no webhook is configured and bot is not linked

title: Funnel Creation Linking Pixels and Telegram Bots
description: Verify creation of tracking funnels that correctly link Facebook pixels and Telegram bots, generating unique slug URLs and invite links.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to funnel creation interface
Select a valid Facebook pixel and Telegram bot to link
Create the funnel
Verify funnel is created and saved successfully
Verify unique tracking slug URLs and Telegram invite links are generated

title: Tracking URL Click Flow with Parameter Capture and Redirect
description: Test that clicking a tracking URL captures fbclid, fbc, fbp, user agent and IP, registers pageviews and clicks, generates a unique Telegram invite link, then redirects to Telegram channel within 3 seconds.

steps.description: Click a valid funnel tracking URL
Verify tracking parameters fbclid, fbc, fbp, user agent, and IP are captured and logged
Verify pageview and click events are registered appropriately
Verify a unique Telegram invite link is generated
Verify redirect to Telegram channel happens within 3 seconds

title: Telegram Webhook Event Processing for Join and Leave
description: Confirm that webhook handlers receive chat_member update events from Telegram, record join and leave actions properly, associate visitor identifiers, and send correct conversion events to Facebook CAPI.

steps.description: Simulate Telegram chat_member join event webhook
Verify join event is recorded and stored
Verify visitor identifiers are associated properly
Verify Facebook CAPI Lead event is triggered with correct user data
Simulate Telegram chat_member leave event webhook
Verify leave event is recorded and stored

title: Subscription Plans Display and Checkout Flow
description: Verify that subscription plans are displayed correctly, checkout flow processes payments via gateway properly, and plan status updates accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to subscription management page
Verify all available subscription plans are displayed with correct details
Select a subscription plan and proceed to checkout
Complete payment via integrated payment gateway
Verify payment is processed successfully
Verify user's subscription plan status is updated accordingly

title: Subscription Usage Limits Enforcement and Plan Upgrade/Downgrade
description: Verify that subscription usage limits are applied and enforced properly and users can upgrade or downgrade plans with status update and usage tracking.

steps.description: Simulate usage that reaches the current subscription's limit
Verify usage limits are enforced and further usage is restricted or warned
Perform plan upgrade and confirm upgrades through checkout
Verify plan is upgraded and increased limits are applied
Perform plan downgrade request
Verify plan downgrade is reflected in user account and limits are adjusted

title: API Performance and Availability under Load
description: Validate system uptime compliance with 99.9% availability and API response latency under 500ms under normal and peak load conditions.

steps.description: Execute continuous API requests simulating normal load
Measure and verify average API latency is under 500ms
Simulate peak load with high concurrency API requests
Verify system maintains responsiveness with latency within 500ms and no downtime
Monitor system uptime metrics
Verify uptime meets or exceeds 99.9% threshold

title: Security and Data Privacy Compliance
description: Verify that TrackGram meets GDPR and LGPD compliance standards including data isolation per user and secure handling of personal data.

steps.description: Access user data and audit data isolation controls
Verify users can only access their own data
Inspect data storage and transmission for encryption and privacy controls
Verify data is encrypted in transit and at rest
Perform data access, deletion and export requests per GDPR/LGPD requirements
Verify user requests are handled correctly within regulatory timeframes

title: Route Protection and Session Expiry Enforcement
description: Ensure that routes requiring authentication are protected and inaccessible without valid sessions, and sessions expire after 7 days forcing re-login.

steps.description: Attempt to access dashboard or management routes without authentication
Verify user is redirected to login page or denied access
Login successfully and maintain a session
Simulate passing of 7 days session duration
Attempt to access protected routes
Verify session is expired and user is prompted to log in again
